2,1.name: Entrance
2,1.description: It is a quiet Friday morning and you find yourself directly infront of the of the VU main building. For some reason, you can not leave this area, and are forced to move north of where you are now.

1,1.name: Lobby
1,1.description: Everything is quieter than usual in the Lobby. The lights are off and it is, thus, darker than usual. You do, however, see a light to your East.

1,2.name: Cafeteria
1,2.description: The cafeteria is, like the lobby, empty. You do, however, hear some noise... you just can't tell from where :O

0,2.name: Eating area
0,2.description: You found the noise! It is coming from some rats eating a rotten sandwich. Also worth noting that, if your made it here, it is the end of the DEMO map :p
